videos.description: Dr. Gary Hedrick, Pastor Jim Bryant and Pastor Stephen Armstrong field questions from attendees at the VBVM Bible Conference on October 12, 2013.
videos.title: 2013 VBVM Conference Panel Discussion

videos.description: A short look back at the main takeaway of our 2014 VBVMI Bible conference on the Last Days: studying the end times is a source of comfort for the Christian.
videos.title: 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Recap

videos.description: The 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Main Session for Pastor Stephen Armstrong, who explains the Biblical imperative to study the end times.
videos.title: Why We Study the End Time - Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The first breakout session of Stephen Armstrong from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Pastor Armstrong discusses all that the Bible can tell us on the coming world leader called the Antichrist.
videos.title: Who is the Antichrist? – Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The second breakout session of Stephen Armstrong from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Pastor Armstrong teaches on the coming apostasy of the church described in the New Testament letters and in the book of Revelation.
videos.title: The Great Apostasy – Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: The 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Main Session for Pastor Jim Bryant, explaining the meaning of Paul's statement in Romans 11 that the Church awaits the fullness of the Gentiles.
videos.title: Understanding the Fullness of the Gentiles - Jim Bryant

videos.description: The first breakout session of Jim Bryant from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Pastor Bryant explain the differences between Covenant and Dispensational Theology and shows from scripture the correct framework for understanding end times teaching.
videos.title: Knowing the Correct End Times Interpretation – Jim Bryant

videos.description: The second breakout session presentation by Pastor Jim Bryant at the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference in San Antonio, Texas. Pastor Bryant explains the importance of a Christian living with an appreciation for the coming Rapture.
videos.title: Living in Anticipation of the Rapture - Jim Bryant

videos.description: The 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference Main Session for Dr. Thomas Ice, who explains the ongoing and increasing persecution of Israel from Revelation 13.
videos.title: The New Antisemitism – Thomas Ice

videos.description: The first breakout session of Dr. Thomas Ice from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Dr. Ice explains Daniel's 70th Week from Daniel 9.
videos.title: Daniel's 70th Week - Dr. Thomas Ice

videos.description: The second breakout session of Dr. Thomas Ice from the 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference. Dr. Ice explains from scripture how the Rapture and the Second Coming of Christ differ.
videos.title: Differences Between the Rapture and Second Coming - Dr. Thomas Ice

videos.description: Watch Dr. Thomas Ice, Pastor Jim Bryant, and Stephen Armstrong answer questions from conference participants. The Q&A session is moderated by Jerry Dyke of VBVMI.
videos.title: Speakers Q&A Session - 2014 VBVMI Bible Conference

videos.description: The 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference has come and gone. Now hear what some of those who attended thought of the event. Thanks to everyone who made this event a success.
videos.title: 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference Recap

videos.description: Pastor Stephen Armstrong teaches from 2Timothy 2 on what motivates Paul and all disciples to serve Christ faithfully. This is the first of four main sessions from the 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference held in San Antonio, Texas on October 8-10.
videos.title: Soldier, Athlete, Farmer: The Rewards of Discipleship - Stephen Armstrong

videos.description: Pastor Stephen Armstrong teaches his first breakout session at the 2015 VBVMI Bible Conference in San Antonio, Texas, on October 8-10.
